alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 15 at 6:20PM EST until February 16 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 MPH expected on the east and southeast slopes of the White Mountains and Western Maine Mountains. A few gusts up to 50 to 55 MPH possible. These gusts will not extend very far from the slopes. * WHERE...In Maine, Northern Oxford, Northern Franklin, Central Somerset and Southern Oxford Counties. In New Hampshire, Southern Coos, Northern Grafton and Northern Carroll Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to noon EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos
